Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting certain information in multiple dwellings containing rent stabilized units
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Posting certain information in multiple dwellings containing rent stabilized units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for practical experience gained separately but concurrently with an apprenticeship to count towards the supervised practical experience time requirement for the granting of high-pressure boiler operating engineer licenses
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing for practical experience gained separately but concurrently with an apprenticeship to count towards the supervised practical experience time requirement for the granting of high-pressure boiler operating engineer licenses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting certain information in multiple dwellings containing rent stabilized units
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting certain information in multiple dwellings containing rent stabilized units
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting certain information in multiple dwellings containing rent stabilized units
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
